frontmatter.title: A DNS-message breakdown no one asked for
frontmatter.description: One of the things that i have always been bad at is networking, and i during my interneting i stumbled upon a blog post talking about DNS. So i decided i would create a DNS client in Rust. So might write a couple of post about my adventures writing it. This post explains a lot of basics
